its director, I could not permit such a thing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Hold on. Alessa died in an accident
shortly after the project started.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh no, Alessa is very much alive;
her 'death' was something she
and Fred came up with. Don't get me wrong—there WAS an accident.
But it didn't kill Alessa.
It just...changed her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Details, details! Look, I'm not an expert
in triangle theory, so if you want any
actual technical answers, you'll need to
go straight to your sister. All I know is this: Alessa wanted to complete
the triangle network in order to get her
original body back, and Trigon was happy
to help her achieve that goal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.text:
And then? Poof! Her sudden change of heart.
But I don't need to tell YOU about that;
I'm sure you've found yourself tossed about
on the stormy seas of her whims before. Regardless, it was too much to ask—the
livelihoods of Trigon's entire staff
hung in the balance, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.text:
So we simply ignored her and went ahead
with the plan—but then she started to
fight back with the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_130.text:
Really? Heck, I thought they were some kind of
natural phenomenon. But if Alessa's the cause,
why not tell us so we can get to the root of
the cause instead of dancin' around the edges?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.text:
Because if I was unwilling to tell
Corana about her sister, I certainly
wasn't about to tell you. After all, if she learned that her darling
sister opposed the completion of the network,
she would have stopped at nothing to prevent
it from coming to fruition.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_150.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_150.text:
If Alessa is truly alive, I want to see her.
I need to know what she discovered that
made her oppose the network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_160.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_160.text:
Oh, I suspect she'll be making her appearance
shortly. You must have noticed the increase in
energy levels, yes? This is a sign that she's
on her way here right now. You see, the previous explosion at the terminal
was surely her doing, and I expect she intends
to sabotage things once again—but I will NOT
allow that to happen this time!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_190.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_190.text:
Tell me why you opposed the triangle network!
Is there some flaw in triangle theory?
Did you make some kind of new discovery?
Have you maybe... Oh, but listen to me ramble! It's you,
Alessa—and you're ALIVE! My sister is ALIVE!
I'm so happy, and yet all I'm doing is
blabbing on about triangle theory!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_200.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_200.text:
Oh, my dear sister... I was performing
secret research in an attempt to apply
triangle theory to a living creature. And you know what? I learned something:
as triangle energy increases, it has an
effect on the life-forms around it—but the
outcome of such effects are VERY unpredictable.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_210.text:
That's why I interfered with the project.
But I couldn't tell you, because then my
forbidden research would have become known.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_220.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_220.text: I have already reaped my own just reward. I can hold this form with enough triangle energy, but if the levels drop, I become something far, far worse. And I can't have that, Corana. I won't. I won't let anyone in this world endure the thing that I have become.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_230.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_230.text:
Such beautiful sentiments, Doctor!
Yet with the massive amount of energy
that can be obtained from the triangle
network, we could evolve you even further! I mean, that WAS your plan all along,
was it not? Do be honest now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_240.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_240.text:
No, you're right. The higher you push
the energy value, the more potential
there is for evolution. But maintaining it at this level is
impossible, because it introduces
mutations in nearby creatures. That's why we have to abort the project,
Corana. We can't allow that to happen—
the people's confidence in the triangle
engines must be maintained.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_250.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_250.text:
OR we can go with my idea instead!
See, the Trigon Corporation won't last
if we don't recoup our investment now. And yes, this will require covering up some
minor inconveniences such as...oh, YOU.
But seeing as you've already died once,
I don't imagine anyone would miss you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_260.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_260.text:
And how are you going to get rid of me?
Will you destroy the triangle network?
That would be pointless—I'll just
destroy the terminal with brute force.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_270.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_270.text:
Oh, I'm well prepared for that.
...Yoo hoo! Fred! I need you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_280.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_280.text:
Oh, I just used a little mechanization
process on him, and this is the result.
Suits him well, don't you think? I did worry at first if he'd be willing
to defy you, but it seems he has enough
dissatisfaction to express in your
general direction. Do enjoy now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_281.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_281.text:
That thing is...Fred?
I can't believe this...

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_290.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_290.text:
Stop! STOP! Madness like this wasn't
why we researched triangle theory!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_320.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_320.text:
Talk about bungling the moment...
My timing always was off with you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_340.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_340.text:
Stay here and protect Corana, Master.
I'm gonna stop those two idiots.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_350.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_350.text: I know you can do it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_010.text:
It appears today was not
his day to die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_020.text:
Glad to hear it.
And now for her...

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
I knew you were hiding something, Alessa,
but I can't believe you actually used
triangle theory on a living creature.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
Once we applied triangle theory to an
artificial intelligence via the BX series,
I simply couldn't contain my curiosity. I started wondering what would happen if we
applied it to a living creature, and had all
confidence it would go swimmingly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_050.text:
But on the off-chance I was wrong, I chose
to conduct the experiment on myself.
No one else was harmed, Corana—I swear.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Alessa, I think we should divide the
network into smaller clusters. While this will prevent triangle energy from
becoming too concentrated in one place, each
cluster will also serve to complement the
others and help keep everything in check. But if we do that, it means...

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_070.text:
That's exactly the kind of solid idea
I'd expect from my genius of a sister—
so don't worry about what happens to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_080.text:
I'm sorry, Alessa. I'm SO sorry. I just...
I can't think of any other way to do this.
The only method I can come up with is
the one that...sacrifices you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_090.text:
I told you not to worry about it, Sis.
I'll always be somewhere in the network,
so I'll always be watching over you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_100.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_100.text:
I'm going to save you someday, Alessa—
I promise. And when I do, we'll go see
the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_110.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_110.text:
Thank you, Corana.
But now...I must go.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_140.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_140.text:
No, she's not gone. She is here.
And there. And all around us.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_160.text:
Actually, I got the power I needed when
I fought Fred and Alessa—just like the
Emerald Wave said I would.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_000.text:
You must stop this ceremony!
There's no telling what could happen!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, Dr. Sitrix. Today is an auspicious day,
for the triangle network has been completed.
And as we've bested so many obstacles together,
we should similarly celebrate as one.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_020.text:
She's right, Corana. Thanks to our new employee
and Master, we also managed to deal with the
Anti-Triangle. I was hoping to show my formal
thanks, but it seems they took a sick day.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Listen to me, both of you: if the energy
levels in this place increase any further,
the terminal is not going to last.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_040.text: And if we don't put the triangle network into full and complete operation today, Trigon won't last. We'll be ruined. And if that happens, we'll have to start all over again from nothing. Our employees? Their families? They'll all be destitute.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen!
I'm proud to announce that with all
the triangle engines now functioning,
the triangle network is complete! This network will change every aspect
of your lives! The Trigon Corporation
will open the door to tomorrow—today!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I knew something like this could happen.
I managed to stop it once before, but not
this time.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Alessa!? You're alive!?
Where have you been?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_100.text:
Now is not the time, Doctor. This area
is dangerous, and we must withdraw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_120.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix...you remain well...
Now r-run... Run n-n-n-n-nooow...

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_150.text:
Look after Corana for a bit, okay, guy?
I don't like the idea of that monster
being the director, but right now
I got no choice but to fight.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_010.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_010.text:
Fred, you know all about the BX series.
Can you fix Master?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_030.text:
Huh? What? Oh, right. Well, I could probably
handle wiring up a few connecting circuits,
but fixing broken parts is beyond me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_040.text:
That's fine. We need to shut down all
the triangle engines at the same time,
which means we have to connect Master
to the network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_050.text:
Like I said, I'll do what I can.
But, uh, please don't hurt me
if this doesn't work, okay?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_020.text:
Good morning, Dr. Alessa Sitrix,
I will have a double espresso.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_030.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_030.text:
Master, we need you to contact all the triangle
engines on the network and shut them down. There
might be some that have to be stopped manually,
so I'll head back to port. Fred, you're with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_040.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_040.text:
Sorry, we're going to RUN 
all the way to the port!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_050.text:
No, you dolt.
You're going to drive.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_060.text:
Hurry, BX10. He won't be able
to do this forever.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_000.text:
Cripes, that director was
one tough cookie.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_010.text:
I don't understand! We disabled all of the
engines, but the energy concentrating here
just keeps rising!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_020.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_020.text:
I'll handle it, Corana—for when you get
down to it, this is all my responsibility. Also, I know it was only for a short time,
but I'm truly happy we were able to see
each other again... Farewell.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_130.text:
Well, that's what
I call a miracle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_140.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_140.text:
It is not a miracle if you
made it happen.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_160.text:
Actually, I got the power I needed
while I was fighting the director—
just like the Emerald Wave said I would.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_000.text: Should be a fire spirit here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_010.text: Let's hurry up and finish this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_030.text: Got my hands on a fire spirit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Did you obtain one of those 'spirits'
just now? I see no change in you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
That's because snagging a spirit doesn't cause
anything special to happen. Bit of a letdown
if you're waiting for the show, I know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Then I will trust you have
achieved your goal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to Dreamland!
Now let us dream together!

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Passing through the amusement park's gate
should let me get back to the Heavens.
And hey, thanks for everything, fella.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Are these Heavens a place
similar to Dreamland?

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Eh, not exactly. Each world's got its own sort
of reality—both good and bad. And while I'd
love to let you come see it for yourself,
I figure you can't leave Corana behind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix has found a suitable
partner, and will be well without me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
So long then, guy.
And so long to you, Vermiglio.
